version_description:
-Now you can save video summaries in the application and watch them even without internet connection.
-Added a new function that allows you to watch video cuts that go with our reports in program's interface.

- Detailed players’ and teams’ profiles
- Full customization of parameters table
- Ability to share videos and playlists in messengers
- Player comparison
- Career page in players’ profiles
- Possibility to purchase subscription in the app

Introducing InStat TV platform for watching live broadcasts and matches.
- Watch live and all past matches directly in the app
- Get statistics on matches and players
- Customize the platform for yourself

Also fixed bugs

Compatibility iOS 10 or later;
Stability improvements and bug fixes.
